jd: Hi Greetings from Smart Folks…!!! My name is Kumar we have a job opportunity for you as Project Manager Business Analyst one of our client based at Cupertino, CA / Sunnyvale, CA Please find the Job description below, if you are available and interested, please send us your word copy of your resume with following detail to kumar@smartfolksinc.com Or please call me on 469 888 5467 to discuss more about this position. Job Title: Project Manager Business AnalystLocation: Cupertino, CA / Sunnyvale, CADuration: Full TimeStart Date: ASAP Primary Skills: Software Consumer App Implementation Experience ResponsibilitiesAssist current lead Program & Product Manager(s) on helping management of multiple existing work streams on large scale project(s)Understand analyze & document business process workflow diagrams, both as-is and to-be and drive overall business analysis with multiple stakeholdersWrite detailed user stories with acceptance criteria, from high level sometimes ambiguous epicsManage backlog & release roadmap for multiple cross functional applications, working with engineers & businessPrepare & maintain comprehensive project plans that details all pre-agreed milestones and dependencies & lead the project independentlyOwn User Acceptance testing end-end - writing test scripts, co-ordinating schedules with geos & technical teams, facilitate triage calls, obtain sign-off & rolloutManage and upkeep of cross functional project plans, BRDs, Test Scripts and other project documents (Full project knowledge-base).Assist with project management office aspects as determined by the Program Lead (i.e. various presentations, project status reports, production support etc)Manage communications with geos, WW & IT & arrive at common solutionEnsure that all project deliverables are diligently tracked and managed while meeting time sensitive deadlinesTracking and managing project risks, actions, issues, dependencies.Multi-task numerous projects and/or requirements concurrently and communicate effectively and drive all project tasks when requiredApply critical thinking to identify potential issues that will impact the progress and proactively address the issues Qualifications6+ years of experience in business analysis & user focussed product managementExperience in managing cross functional project roadmapsGood time management skills and proven ability in meeting deadlines and working with both technology & business teams in high pressure and results-driven environmentExcellent teamwork skills and ability to influence others and an ability to quickly establish trust and credibilityHigh level of professionalism, energy and sense of urgency to “make things happen”5+ years of experience on technology focused projects around customer facing application deployment and/or complex mobile app development.Experienced in waterfall, Agile, Scrum, Hybrid program management methodologiesExcellent organizational skills including attention to details and multitasking skillsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsDetailed knowledge of product development process and life cycle managementSelf-motivated and proactive with demonstrated sharp learning curve on technical solutions.Familiarity with software engineering is a plusExperience with data analysis is a plus Education• Bachelor’s degree• PMI/PMP certification preferred• Agile certification preferred If you are interested in the position, please fill the details: Full Name Contact Number Email Id DOB (MMDD) Current location Visa status Relocation
